ComicInfo.Penciller: Allan Otero,David Lorenzo Riveiro,Larry Watts,Marc Rosete,Mike DeBalfo,Mike Krome,Salvatore Cuffari
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: Genesis: Heroes Reborn
ComicInfo.Summary:
One issue...five action packed stories...no ads! With 30 pages of action spotlighting the best known characters from the Grimm Universe this is a great intro to the most popular Zenescope titles and characters. A great jumping on point for new readers, and a super value for current fans.
Story TitlesVan Helsing: Timeless ClassicRobyn Hood: Auld Lang SyneWonderland: Mad DreamsDeath Force: TotemsGrimm Fairy Tales: Judgment Rising
